channel.title: Blogs on Reda El Hail
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Reda El Hail

item.title: Docker Cheat Sheet
item.description: Containers Stop all Docker containers Stop all Docker containers: docker kill $(docker ps -q) Remove all Docker containers Remove all Docker containers: docker rm $(docker ps -a -q) Remove all Docker images Remove all Docker images: docker rmi $(docker images -q) The -q flag will only list the IDs for those containers. Volumes Create volume Create volume: docker volume create name_volume This will automatically create a volume mounted on the specified container:

item.title: Radar human activity recognition with machine learning
item.description: These videos show a demonstration of indoor human activity recognition using FMCW radar and machine learning. The radar is placed in h roof and it has a field of view covering 120 degrees in all directions. The schematic below shows the full system from the sensor node to the cloud. This demo runs a convolutional neural network that was trained on a previously collected dataset in the same environment with different people.

item.title: Visualization of different optimization algorithms used in deep learning
item.description: 1. Gradient Descent Equation: θ = θ - α * ∇J(θ) Description: θ: Parameters (weights) of the model being optimized. α (alpha): Learning rate, determines the size of the steps taken during optimization. ∇J(θ): Gradient of the cost function with respect to the parameters. 2. Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD) Equation: θ = θ - α * ∇J(θ, xi, yi) Description: θ: Parameters (weights) of the model being optimized. α (alpha): Learning rate, determines the size of the steps taken during optimization.
